name: Seattle Sports Safety Sash - Unisex - Unisex
description: A safety sash to make pedestrians and cyclists more visible in murky weather or while riding at night. A group of MEC buyers, designers, and representatives from the City of Vancouver brainstormed and came up with a idea of a simple safety sash to prevent injury to pedestrians, joggers, cyclists, and bladers.Simple design features Scotchlite® reflective strips.Compact enough to fit inside a pocket.Dimensions are 150 x 5.5cm (length x width).
